product_name: CygoLite Streak 310 and Hotshot SL Combo Bike Light Set
long_description: Illuminate the path ahead with a 310-lumen beam and enhance visibility from the rear with this CygoLite bike light combo. Streak 310 headlight and Hotshot SL rear light help you see and be seen.
short_description: Illuminate the path ahead with a 310-lumen beam and enhance visibility from the rear with this CygoLite bike light combo. Streak 310 headlight and Hotshot SL rear light help you see and be seen.
